TopicTitle: What is the button to switch the Map View to the Mun?

Articles.Content:
Title says it all. I just got the x release and need to know how to change the map to the mun.

Also, How to see my velocity relative to the mun.

Thanks!
Press tab to switch what you are focusing on (Currently your spacecraft, Kerbin, and the Mun).
Thanks! Also, How to I switch the velocity so I can tell my speed when on the mun?

Thanks! Also, How to I switch the velocity so I can tell my speed when on the mun?

Just click on the velocity meter (where it says surface speed, to switch to orbital and vice versa)

Orbital velocity takes into account the planet\'s rotation, so on Kerbin it will read like 175 or something while landed.

Surface is relative to, you guessed it, the surface speed. Keep it on surface for landings.

The navball automatically switches to the body you are in the \'sphere of influence\' of-so to change it to be relative to the mun you simply need to get close enough-just remember to have it set to \'surface\' if you\'re trying to land.
Remeber to switch back to orbit for trying to get to orbit though. I\'ve goofed more than one attempt by going 2.2km/s to the surface... and 2.4km/s true.
